Texts.Chs: <这本书有几十页，写满了奇怪的数学和计算，用的是一种你完全不熟悉的编号。一开始他们的叙述看起来语无伦次，直到算式几乎在你眼前自行解决。它们似乎给出了一个与已知空间扇区不匹配的坐标位置和一把
Texts.Eng: <There are dozens of pages in this volume, all strange math and bizarre calculations using a numbering scheme completely alien to you. They at first seem like incoherent blabbering until the formula starts to resolve itself almost before your eyes. It appears to give a location in coordinates that match no known sector of space and a blueprint for a

Texts.Chs: 封面上奇怪的符号让你不安。
Texts.Eng: A strange symbol on the cover unsettles you.

Texts.Chs: 让我们知道，在我们终结之后没有我们的空间。我们所有的一切，我们所能成为的一切，都属于它们。它们在宇宙之间徘徊，对我们所有琐碎的争吵漠不关心。它们的即为混沌。总有一天它们会归来，吞噬整个宇宙。观察那些无光之地。好好看着他们。
Texts.Eng: Let it be known that there is no space for us after our end. All that we are, all that we could ever be, belongs to THEM. Prowling about in the spaces between, indifferent to all our petty squabbles. Their nature is the very essence of chaos. They will return one day, and devour the cosmos. Watch the places where all light fades. Watch them well.

Texts.Chs: 在那里使用的武器，你也无法用目前的物理知识去理解破译这些知识。>
Texts.Eng: weapon to use there, also indecipherable by your current understanding of physics.>
